text: Colin Covert is an American movie critic, historian, and journalist. He worked as a critic for the Minneapolis Star Tribune. In December 2018, Covert resigned from the Tribune after he was accused of plagiarism.Star Tribune film critic resigns amid evidence of plagiarism Covert was born in Elizabeth, New Jersey. He studied at Macalester College. He was raised in Minnesota. Covert now lives in Minneapolis, Minnesota. ==References== ==Other websites== * Colin Covert at rottentomatoes.com * Colin Covert bio at startribune.com Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:American journalists Category:American historians Category:Movie critics from Chicago Category:Writers from Minneapolis Category:Writers from Chicago Category:Writers from New Jersey
title: Colin Covert
